name: Marvel & Capcom vs Sentinels
description:
I'm just a Marvel vs Capcom fan making a short Checkers-like game.

Gameplay:

  • Short: ~ 10-20 minutes from beginning to end.
  • Super Simplistic (like Checkers):
    • Move Hero Units onto Enemy Units to attack them. Units with greater attack power will eliminate the Units with less attack power.
    • Defend the Base!

I own nothing. All Characters belong to either Marvel or Capcom. 

Characters:

  • Marvel
    • Captain America
    • Spider-Man
    • Storm
  • Capcom
    • Ryu
    • Hayato Kanzaki

Let me know what you think! Will love feedback for future fan games!
